trans-unit.source: Delete Autoscale Settings
trans-unit.target: Delete Autoscale Settings

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Delete Autoscale Settings</languageKeyword> operation can be used to remove automatic scaling settings from deployments of Cloud Services, Virtual Machines, Websites, and Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Delete Autoscale Settings</languageKeyword> operation can be used to remove automatic scaling settings from deployments of Cloud Services, Virtual Machines, Websites, and Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: You can turn off automatic scaling without deleting settings by using <link xlink:href="ecffbd15-d7c1-4703-866b-25b27ff87f79" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Autoscale Settings</link> and assigning the value of the Enable element to <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: You can turn off automatic scaling without deleting settings by using <link xlink:href="ecffbd15-d7c1-4703-866b-25b27ff87f79" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Autoscale Settings</link> and assigning the value of the Enable element to <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Delete Autoscale Settings</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Delete Autoscale Settings</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: DELETE
trans-unit.target: DELETE

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the parameter to use for a cloud service that has web roles or worker roles deployed to it.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the parameter to use for a cloud service that has web roles or worker roles deployed to it.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-slot%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>staging</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>production</languageKeyword>, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-slot%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>staging</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>production</languageKeyword>, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;role%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the role.

trans-unit.source: The parameter is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: The parameter is case-sensitive.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameter
trans-unit.target: URI Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be removed from a role in the production or staging deployment environments for the specified cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be removed from a role in the production or staging deployment environments for the specified cloud service.

trans-unit.source: For more information about finding the names of cloud services in your subscription, see <externalLink><linkText>List Hosted Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460781.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about finding the names of cloud services in your subscription, see <externalLink><linkText>List Hosted Services</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460781.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about finding role names, see <externalLink><linkText>Get Deployment</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460804.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about finding role names, see <externalLink><linkText>Get Deployment</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460804.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the parameter to use for a cloud service that has Virtual Machines deployed to it.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the parameter to use for a cloud service that has Virtual Machines deployed to it.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;availability-set%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the availability set in which the Virtual Machines are a member.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;availability-set%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the availability set in which the Virtual Machines are a member.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameter
trans-unit.target: URI Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be removed from an availability set of Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be removed from an availability set of Virtual Machines.

trans-unit.source: For more information about finding the name of an availability set in which a Virtual Machine is a member, see <externalLink><linkText>Get Deployment</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460804.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about finding the name of an availability set in which a Virtual Machine is a member, see <externalLink><linkText>Get Deployment</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/ee460804.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the parameter to use for Websites.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the parameter to use for Websites.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;webspace%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the webspace and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;serverfarm%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the server farm in that webspace.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;webspace%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the webspace and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;serverfarm%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the server farm in that webspace.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameter
trans-unit.target: URI Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be removed from a server farm in a webspace.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be removed from a server farm in a webspace.

trans-unit.source: For more information about finding the names of webspaces, see <externalLink><linkText>List Webspaces</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn166961.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about finding the names of webspaces, see <externalLink><linkText>List Webspaces</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn166961.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about finding the names of server farms, see <externalLink><linkText>Create, Manage, or Delete a Server Farm</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn194277.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about finding the names of server farms, see <externalLink><linkText>Create, Manage, or Delete a Server Farm</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn194277.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the parameter to use for Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the parameter to use for Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;mobileservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the Mobile Service.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;mobileservice%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the Mobile Service.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameter
trans-unit.target: URI Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be removed from a Mobile Service.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the automatic scaling settings should be removed from a Mobile Service.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2013-10-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2013-10-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <externalLink><linkText>Service Management Versioning</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/gg592580.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Management Portal to delete autoscale settings from your application.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the Management Portal to delete autoscale settings from your application.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>How to Scale an Application</linkText><linkUri>http://www.windowsazure.com/manage/services/cloud-services/how-to-scale-a-cloud-service/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <externalLink><linkText>How to Scale an Application</linkText><linkUri>http://www.windowsazure.com/manage/services/cloud-services/how-to-scale-a-cloud-service/</linkUri></externalLink>.
